attributes.action: To resume driving lessons and tests!
attributes.additional_details: Instructors are unable to work from home and it’s is educational for students!!! Where in school there is no social distancing and mixing with 100s of households!
attributes.background: Resume driving lessons and tests!it’s is educational and instructors are unable to work from home!if takeaways and construction is allowed then driving tests/lessons should be allowed!just put tougher restrictions on for example limited time in the car!!!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
